sectionTitle: Associate Degree in Information Technology and current engineering student with a focus on web development.
cardP1: I am an IT technician and currently pursuing an engineering degree to complete and expand my professional training. Focused on web development, continuous learning, and problem-solving. I'm starting my journey in programming and looking for opportunities to gain experience in creating creatives and functional solutions.
cardP2: I consider myself a responsible, proactive person, and committed to my projects and studies. Moreover, I enjoy exploring new technologies that allow me to improve my skills and contribute to the projects I am part of.
project1_description: Web application designed with html, css and javascript. With the aim of keeping track of activities to be done
project2_description: Memory game designed with html, css and javascript. Which logs and displays the best times on screen
project3_description: Web application that consumes the Marvel API, includes a search bar, and simulates user sign-up and login.
project4_description: This website is based in FreeCodeCamp testimonials. Created with react and css
project5_description: Keeps track of teachers, students and grade levels of the school. It was developed in Visual Basic 2010, using Access as the database management system
